snippet: Monrovia, Liberia, is the first major metropolitan area to face an Ebola outbreak, and many of the infected there are left to die at the gates of overcrowded hospitals.
lead_paragraph: Monrovia, Liberia, is the first major metropolitan area to face an Ebola outbreak, and many of the infected there are left to die at the gates of overcrowded hospitals.

headline.main: Dying of Ebola at the Hospital Door
